scripts.test:chrome: BROWSER_NAME=chrome npx wdio run wdio.conf.js 2>&1 --parallel=true | tee ./terminal_log.txt
scripts.test:chromexx: BROWSER_NAME=chrome npx wdio run wdio.conf-xx.js 2>&1 | tee ./terminal_log.txt
scripts.test:chromewin: BROWSER_NAME=chrome powershell npx wdio run wdio.conf.js 2>&1 ^| tee-object -FilePath .\terminal_log.txt
scripts.test:chromewindows: powershell mkdir .\cypress\logs && (powershell npm run cy:chrome 2>&1 ^| tee-object -FilePath .\cypress\logs\terminal_log.txt)
scripts.test:firefox: BROWSER_NAME=firefox npx wdio run wdio.conf.js 2>&1 --parallel=true | tee ./terminal_log.txt
scripts.test:firefoxxx: BROWSER_NAME=firefox npx wdio run wdio.conf-xx.js 2>&1 | tee ./terminal_log.txt
scripts.test:edge: BROWSER_NAME=MicrosoftEdge npx wdio run wdio.conf.js 2>&1 --parallel=true | tee ./terminal_log.txt
scripts.test:edgexx: BROWSER_NAME=MicrosoftEdge npx wdio run wdio.conf-xx.js 2>&1 | tee ./terminal_log.txt
